stable.change_log:
BravePipe Release 0.27.6-2.3.7

Fixes:
- BravePipe(Extractor): RUMBLE: fix some hls streams
- BravePipe(Extractor): YOUTUBE: Adds a new regex to find the signature deobfuscation

Misc:
- BravePipe: changing default name of settings export file to BravePipeData
  and the default subscription-only file to bravepipe_subscriptions.
